scenario.name: Sipwise NGCP Benchmark UAS Registration
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=1]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=1] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=1]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=1]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: "TestBria" <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=1]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=1]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 3 REGISTER Contact: "TestBria" <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=1]@[local_ip]:[local_port];ob> Contact: "TestBria" <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=1]@[local_ip]:6666;ob>;reg-id=1;+sip.instance="<urn:uuid:C3DD6013-20E8-40E3-8EA2-5849B02ED0C4>";expires=0 Expires: 300 Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
